name: EXT_ADDRESS
description: The EXT_ADDRESS table contains information about Care Everywhere Direct message recipients. The records in this table are Direct addresses of external recipients (DXA records) designated for Care Everywhere.

columns.name: EXT_ADDRESS_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the recipient record.

columns.name: MIXED_DIRECT_ADDR
columns.description: Formatted like an email address, this is how Direct messaging knows where to send a message. This item is stored in mixed case to use in display in addressing.
